root.name: Hello Kitty's Cube Frenzy
root.description: OverviewHello Kitty's Cube Frenzy is a Falling Block game. Players try to match the correct colors in order to break them and have enough room for the next set of blocks. The game is similar to Tetris.CharactersHello KittyFloral Resort KittyChinese Robe KittyAngel KittyWedding KittySnowboarding KittySoccer KittyAstronaut KittyKimono KittyCowgirl KittyBikini KittyPochaccoPattyJimmyPurinBadtz MaruKikiLala
